alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 12:57PM MST until February 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations up to one inch in the Guadalupe Mountains and ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, and Lower Brewster County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
